reviewText: I have only watched about 75 dramas so far, and there are maybe a dozen I would watch again and again. This one is at the top of that list. LOVED LOVED IT! It had everything that I adore in kdramas. I wish it weren't so expensive!

Gong Yoo was awesome!  Love him.  Love all those little stories surrounding the main love triangle.  Great acting in every part of the story with everyone.  I have lost count on how many times I have watched this drama. : )
